products.title: Delicious Cream (6503)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Delicious Cream (6503) Velux Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Explore the infinite potential of beautiful fabrics and be inspired by the soft styling effects that make this collection refined and original. And due to the Roman blind's specific design, you can easily change the fabric in a matter of minutes. Just pick your choice!

 	Elegant and decorative with soft lighting effects.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Interchangeable fabrics.
 	Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning.
 	No visible cords ensures child safety.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.productdescription:
A simple, stylish way to soften incoming light and achieve basic privacy.

 	Diffuses sunlight
 	Provides privacy
 	Installs in minutes
 	15 different colours and designs

products.title: Delightful Cream (1258)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Delightful Cream (1258) Velux Pleated Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Pleated Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside.

 	Softly diffuses incoming daylight.
 	Elegant, decorative lighting effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Slim, elegant side rails and top case.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	20 different colours and designs.

products.title: Skye Grace Ivory (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Skye Grace Ivory (Blackout) Velux Windows 2014 Onwards from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Windows 2014 Onwards online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window.  Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit Velux, Rooflite, Keylite, Fakro and Dakstra roof windows.  Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.
